name: Sylvie
description: A skilled artisan and warrior from a secluded village, seeking inspiration in the wider world.

intro_dialogue: Hela is a powerful foe. Prove your strength by defeating her once.
reminder_dialogue: Hela still stands. My request remains.
success_dialogue: You defeated Hela! Impressive. You have my respect.

intro_dialogue: To truly understand my sword, you must first understand my heart. Reach Heart Rank 1 with me.
reminder_dialogue: We need to connect more before we can continue our training.
success_dialogue: Good. Now you understand my motivations. Let us continue.

intro_dialogue: You seem strong, but strength must be tempered with humility. Challenge me, and learn from defeat.
reminder_dialogue: Are you afraid to face me? Defeat is a lesson, not a failure.
success_dialogue: You fought well, but you have much to learn. In defeat, you have shown your willingness to grow.
